Class JsonUtils

java.lang.Object
utils.JsonUtils
public class JsonUtils extends Object
Provides utility methods for reading and writing JSON data related to Aula and Prenotazione.

This class uses Gson for JSON serialization and deserialization, with custom adapters for handling AulaInterface, LocalDate, and LocalTime objects. It supports reading and writing lists of AulaInterface and Prenotazione objects to and from JSON files.

  • Method Details

    • leggiAuleDaJson

      public static List<AulaInterface> leggiAuleDaJson()
      Reads classroom data from a predefined JSON file into a list of AulaInterface objects.

      Uses the file path specified by AULE_FILE_PATH ("data/aule.json") to load classroom data. Returns an empty list if an IOException occurs during reading.

      Returns:
      A List of AulaInterface objects deserialized from the JSON file.

    • leggiPrenotazioniDaJson

      public static List<Prenotazione> leggiPrenotazioniDaJson(String filePath) throws IOException
      Reads booking data from a specified JSON file into a list of Prenotazione objects.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the JSON file containing booking data.
      Returns:
      A List of Prenotazione objects deserialized from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • leggiDaJson

      private static <T> List<T> leggiDaJson(String filePath, Class<T[]> classOfT)
      Generic method to read JSON data from a file into a list of objects of type T.

      Uses Gson with custom adapters for AulaInterface, LocalDate, and LocalTime to deserialize the JSON content. Returns an empty list if an IOException occurs, logging the error to the console.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of objects in the array, which must implement or extend the expected interface/class.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the JSON file to read.
      classOfT - The Class object representing the array type to deserialize into (e.g., AulaInterface[].class).
      Returns:
      A List of objects of type T deserialized from the JSON file.

    • scriviPrenotazioniSuJson

      public void scriviPrenotazioniSuJson(String filePath, List<Prenotazione> prenotazioni) throws IOException
      Writes a list of Prenotazione objects to a JSON file at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the JSON file where the bookings will be written.
      prenotazioni - The list of Prenotazione objects to serialize and save.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while writing to the file.

    • scriviSuJson

      private <T> void scriviSuJson(String filePath, List<T> objects)
      Generic method to write a list of objects of type T to a JSON file.

      Uses Gson with custom adapters for LocalDate and LocalTime to serialize the objects into a pretty-printed JSON format. Prints an error stack trace to the console if an IOException occurs during writing.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of objects in the list.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the JSON file where the objects will be written.
      objects - The list of objects to serialize and save.
